text: Always kiss your children goodnight, even if they're already asleep.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: How pleasant it is for a father to sit at his child's board. It is like an aged man reclining under the shadow of an oak which he has planted.
author: Voltaire

text: The truth is that parents are not really interested in justice. They just want quiet.
author: Bill Cosby

text: Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
author: Erma Bombeck

text: Every cliche about kids is true they grow up so quickly, you blink and they're gone, and you have to spend the time with them now. But that's a joy.
author: Liam Neeson
